GSD.description:
gfs2: Check sb_bsize_shift after reading superblock

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit 1ad197097343568066a8ffaa27ee7d0ae6d9f476. For more details please see the references link.
